q.name: Disintegrate
q.description: Active:  Annie deals magic damage to a target enemy. If Disintegrate kills the target, it refunds its mana cost.

p.description: After every 4 spell casts, Annie's next offensive spell will stun all damaged enemies for 1.75 seconds. The stunning spell does not count towards Pyromania's counter.
p.name: Pyromania

r.description: Active:  Annie summons Tibbers to the target location in a burst of flame, dealing magic damage to enemies within 290 range. Tibbers remains on the field for up to 45 seconds, and Annie can control his movement and his physical attacks. Tibbers is also surrounded by a flaming aura that deals magic damage every second to enemies within 200 range of himself.
r.name: Summon Tibbers

e.description: Active:  For 5 seconds, Annie has increased armor and magic resistance and deals magic damage to enemies whenever they use a basic attack against her.
e.name: Molten Shield

w.name: Incinerate
w.description: Active:  Annie deals magic damage to all enemies in a 50 degree conical area within range.
